          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic radiation absorption and transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetische Strahlung Absorption und 
Übertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption et transmission de rayonnement 
électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption e transmissão da radiação 
eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento e trasmissione di radiazione 
elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απορρόφηση και μετάδοση ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Absorción y transmisión de la radiación 
electromágnetica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that some radiation is absorbed and that some is transmitted when light hits polyethylene.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light sensors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polyethylene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">torch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß etwas 
Strahlung aufgesogen wird und daß einiges übertragen wird, wenn 
Licht Polyäthylen schlägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre qu'un certain rayonnement 
est absorbé et qu'une partie est transmise quand la lumière frappe 
le polyéthylène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que alguma radiação está 
absorvida e que algum está transmitido quando a luz bate o 
polietileno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che una certa radiazione è
assorbita e che alcuno è trasmesso quando la luce colpisce il 
polietilene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι κάποια 
ακτινοβολία απορροφάται και ότι μερικές διαβιβάζονται όταν 
χτυπά το φως το πολυαιθυλένιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que una cierta radiación 
está absorbida y que algo está transmitida cuando la luz golpea el 
polietileno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
